page.title: 11INDUSTRY
page.content: There are great changes in unemployment in the last ten years. PAST there was low unemployment - migrant population dockyard, oil refinery, army, navy, engineering, marconi, avionics, paper. Many apprenticeships for school leavers especially at Chatham Dockyard. Industrial estate along River Medway. Large number of commuters - London offices.Local office and shop jobs available. PRESENT high unemployment - many redundancies. Dockyard, oil refinery, etc closed. Many school leavers unemployed. Enterprise zone - new small businesses:- electronics, computing, design. Many more women are employed. There are more large stores and supermarkets.
